Row.Text: +1 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness per Age on [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Diplomacy and [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness Buildings. Doubled if a Building is both.
+10 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness per Age in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities while at peace.
+2 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness per Age for active [icon:ENDEAVOR] Endeavors, [icon:SANCTIONS] Sanctions, and [icon:PROJECT] Projects you started or supported.
+2 [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence per Age for every Leader you are [icon:PLAYER_RELATIONSHIP_FRIENDLY] Friendly or [icon:PLAYER_RELATIONSHIP_HELPFUL] Helpful with.
+1 [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence and [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness per Age for every [icon:CITYSTATE] City-State you are Suzerain of. Repeatable.
